segments.text: Could we borrow the company van for a fundraiser this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be a possibility . Where is this fundraiser taking place ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is in the hotel ballroom down the street .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you need it for the whole weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We will need it for both days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We will need to know who will be driving the van .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The van will be driven by Mary and me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It needs to be back on Sunday night . Can you arrange for that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh yeah , no problem . Would you mind if we borrowed a few of the chairs from the lunchroom .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just keep track of everything and get it all back where you took it from by Sunday evening .
segments.speaker: S2
